glyphs.name: Tears of Blood
bonus: For every 5 Core Stats purchased within range, you gain x {value} increased damage.
Grants + {value} bonus to all Rare nodes within range. Bonus increases by 10% every 10 levels.

glyphs.name: Ambidextrous
bonus: Grants + {value} bonus to all Magic nodes within range.
additional_bonus: You deal x8% increased damage while Weilding One-Handed Weapons.

glyphs.name: Bloodfeeder
bonus: For every 5 Dexterity purchased within range, you deal + {value} increased damage to Bleeding targets.

additional_bonus: When an enemy is damaged by you, they become Vulnerable for 3 seconds. This cannot happen more than once every 20 seconds per enemy.
